title: bug fantasy
content:
polished to mirror finish,
now tarnished and green
with algae, moss, water, age.

most loathesome hero,
the knight in full plate
is dual-wielding shields.

crouching, crawling, crumblingâ€“
from the weight of it all,
and sinks deeper into the bog.

camouflage from ally, even
the birds and mice cannot find
our miserable bulwark beetle.
